title: ArcSoft TotalMedia Theatre 6.5.1.150 Final [ChingLiu]
description:
What's new in TotalMedia Theater 6.5? 

- Fully compatible with Windows 8.1 
- Supports 4K video playback 
- Support Blu-ray disc playback over Miracast 
- Adds anti-shake feature to SimHD 
- Improved auto-refresh rate changing 
- Supports Media Center plug-in default language 
- Supports Intel Haswell 
- Fixed YouTube download issue 
- Fixed Media Center crash issue when switching Resume DVD option 

Supported OS

Windows XP (32-bit), Vista (32/64bit), Windows 7 (32/64bit), Windows 8 (32/64bit), Windows 8.1 (32/64bit)

Minimum System Requirements 

-CPU: Intel Core2 Duo CPU E4600 @ 2.40GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+ 2.4GHz 
-RAM: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8(1G) 
-Graphics Card: NVIDIA (GeForce 8600 GT), AMD (ATI Radeon HD 3600 Series), Intel (Intel G45 Express Chipset) 
-HDD: 300M 
-Optical Driver: Blu-ray Disc driver for BD Playback 
-Screen Resolution: 1280 x 1024 

Languages : English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese (Brazil), Chinese (Traditional), Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Russian, Swedish

Homepage :  <a href="
http://www.arcsoft.com/totalmedia-theatre/overview.html#subNav" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.arcsoft.com/totalmedia-theatre/overview.html#subNav</a>
